nodes.text: The Firestorm Turbolaser was an adaption of the Desolator superweapon developed by the Sith Empire for use in the Battle of Corellia. Consisting of an suspended ovoid with two turbolaser barrels attached, the weapon superheated its targets to literally set the air aflame. However, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython was able to destroy the three Firestorm Turbolasers that the Empire had deployed in Axial Park, ending the threat.
